channel.title: Teleport?
channel.description: Is there a way to fix it so everyone will turn back to normal size instead of the tiny tele thing you turn into. When you do any kind of teleport except the ones from the emote list it leaves you as a small person. Can i fix this besides logging out and in or casting some kind of spell on someone.

item.title: Teleport?
item.dc:creator: @c_h_r_i_s c h r i s
item.description:
@c_h_r_i_s wrote:

i think its just a glitch i dont think you can fix it, i cant find a way but i dont think you can change it, it doesnt always happen, just most of the timeâ€¦

Read full topic
